name: Rapid Retort
description:
Rapid Retort is a time trial FPS with an emphasis on speed and self improvement. Face a gauntlet of challenges designed to challenge your fundamental FPS skills. No filler, just you and your ability to hit targets and avoid obstacles.

Features

  • Over 50 levels in environments ranging from tight corridors to open farmland
  • 30 different firearms including high penetration magnums and lever actions
  • Varying traps and tricks to test your awareness
